astro:dev.description: Start the development server for the astro project

astro:build.description: Build the project for production for the astro project

astro:preview.description: Preview the production build for the astro project

strapi.description: Displays a help menu or a list of available commands for Strapi
strapi.command: cd cms && npm install && sh -c 'npm run strapi'

strapi:dev.command: cd cms && npm install && sh -c 'npm run develop'

strapi:develop.description: Also starts the Strapi development server
strapi:develop.command: cd cms && npm install && sh -c 'npm run develop'

strapi:build.description: Build the strapi project for production
strapi:build.command: cd cms && npm install && sh -c 'npm run build'

strapi:console.description: Open an interactive console (REPL) for the Strapi application
strapi:console.command: cd cms && npm install && sh -c 'npm run console'

strapi:deploy.command: cd cms && npm install && sh -c 'npm run deploy'

strapi:start.command: cd cms && npm install && sh -c 'npm run start'

strapi:upgrade.description: Upgrade to the latest version of Strapi
strapi:upgrade.command: cd cms && npm install && sh -c 'npx @strapi/upgrade latest'

strapi:upgrade:dry.description: Simulate an upgrade to the latest version of Strapi
strapi:upgrade:dry.command: cd cms && npm install && sh -c 'npx @strapi/upgrade latest --dry'
